errors.pattern: syntax error at token|unexpected identifier|VAR declaration error
errors.cause: Missing MODULE declarations, duplicate variable names, or misplaced INIT/TRANS sections

solutions.code:
DEFINE ready := state = idle;
ASSIGN init(state) := idle;

errors.pattern: out of memory in BDD|variable ordering|Too many BDD nodes
errors.cause: Poor variable ordering or unbounded integer ranges

solutions.when: Unbounded INT leads to huge BDDs

errors.pattern: Fair path does not exist|no FAIR path found
errors.message: CTL/LTL property fails due to fairness handling

errors.pattern: Parsing LTL formula failed|undefined symbol in LTLSPEC
errors.cause: Using CTL-only operators or missing specification binding

errors.pattern: Undefined module|could not resolve module name
errors.cause: Missing MODULE definition or wrong parameter list

errors.message: Model lacks initial conditions or transitions
errors.cause: init()/next() not specified for all variables

solutions.code:
INIT state = idle;
ASSIGN next(state) := case ... esac;
